Detailed Description

Common interface for a container of properties.

Definition at line 19 of file IPropertiesManager.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum iprop::IPropertiesManager::ChangeFlags

Data model change notification flags.

Enumerator
CF_RESET 

The property manager was initialized.

CF_ADD_PROPERTY 

A new property was added to the manager.

virtual QByteArray iprop::IPropertiesManager::GetPropertyId ( int  propertyIndex) const
pure virtual

Get the ID of the property with the given index propertyIndex.

Property ID must be unique in the property set.

virtual void iprop::IPropertiesManager::InsertProperty ( iser::IObject *  objectPtr,
const QByteArray &  propertyId,
const QByteArray &  propertyDescription,
int  propertyFlags,
bool  releaseFlag 
)
pure virtual

Insert an property into the object.

Parameters
objectPtrProperty data object.
propertyIdUnique ID of the property in the properties repository.
propertyDescriptionHuman readable description of the property.
propertyFlagsProperty flags.
See Also
IProperty::PropertyFlags.
Parameters
releaseFlagIndicate who control the property's memory. If releaseFlag is true, the control over the objectPtr will be overtaken by this object.

Implemented in iprop::CPropertiesManager.

virtual void iprop::IPropertiesManager::ResetProperties ( )
pure virtual

Reset properties.

The method set all static properties to their default values and removes all dynamically added properties from the manager.

Implemented in iprop::CPropertiesManager.
